thread.section_title: Blueinsurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blueinsurance | blueinsurance.ie
thread.title: Garrett Mahon

author: Garrett Mahon
title: Garrett Mahon
text:
A bad situation was made better by the two staff Claire and anon ( sorry cant remember name ).Both should be congratulated.
However I do feel that I have forced into taking out a policy that May be more expensive as I had no choice but to go with Blue at that time as my mortgage application was been held up by Blue.
Normally I would shop around before purchase.
Also it took nearly a week to sort out a problem that should of been done quicker.
